channel.title: Imaging Series on Ravings of a Mad Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Imaging Series on Ravings of a Mad Engineer

item.title: Series 1
item.description:
Telescope: William Optics Fluorostar 91 w/ Flat 6A III Mount: Sky-Watcher EQ6-R Pro Camera: ZWO ASI2600MM Pro Filter Wheel: ZWO EFW 7x36mm

  • ZWO Premium L 36mm unmounted
  • ZWO Premium R 36mm unmounted
  • ZWO Premium G 36mm unmounted
  • ZWO Premium B 36mm unmounted
  • ZWO H-a 7nm 36mm unmounted
  • ZWO O-III 7nm 36mm unmounted
  • ZWO S-II 7nm 36mm unmounted Guiding: ZWO OAG-L with ZWO ASI290MM Mini
